item.title: Workshop: Cloud-native Network Functions (CNFs) @ Open Source Summit 2018
item.description: Network Service Mesh will be one of the topics of discussion at Workshop: Cloud-native Network Functions (CNFs) @ Open Source Summit 2018) on Aug 28, 2018 from 1:30pm - 4:30pm. Supporting Collateral Slides Website Code Network Service Mesh Happy Hour ARC Bar at Fairmont Waterfront Hotel Tue Aug 28 7:30pm-9pm Frequently Asked Questions window.addEventListener('message', function (event) { if (event.data.hasOwnProperty("FrameHeight")) { $("#IFrameId").css("height", event.data.FrameHeight); } }); function setIframeHeight(ifrm) { var height = ifrm.

item.title: Network Service Mesh at KubeCon + CloudNativeCon North America 2018
item.description: Several talks and demos targeting different experience are scheduled for KubeCon North America 2018. Please join us to get more insights about Network Service Mesh (NSM), the current state of the project and live demos of NSM in action. All NSM events at Kubecon are also on the Network Service Mesh Community Calendar Monday, December 10 1:40pm - 2:00pm - Facts on the Ground Stitching up an L2 CNF with Network Service Mesh and VPP - Thomas 3:20pm - 3:40pm - Accelerating Network Security with VPP and Network Service Mesh - Matt Tuesday, December 11 2:00pm 2:30pm - Network Service Mesh Demo/Presentation @ Cisco Booth/Theather on Expo Floor - Ed 3:40pm - 4:15pm - Intro: Network Service Mesh BoF - Ed and Frederick 4:15pm - 5:15pm - Happy Hour, beginning at the end of Intro NSM, migrate to Expo floor.

item.title: Network Service Mesh at Open Networking Summit 2018
item.description: Network Service Mesh will be one of the featured talks at ONS Europe. The talk will revolve around the basics of Network Service Mesh, future roadmap, and how you can get involved. Please join Kyle and Frederick on September 26 from 14:30 - 15:00 in Amsterdam. Happy NSM Hour Wednesday - The Apollo Hotel Lounge - 7:30 PM Supporting Collatoral Slides
